Okei thank you my mistake ! I've burned the image file to a blank DVD (haha) What now ? Do i have to go to boot room and change something there or can i just click install when I push the disc into the disc driver ?
What do i do ? Can i just click autorun and click install or run program or do i have to change something in the boot room and do DVD priority something! hahaha thanx for your help :D

"duncanthy"

After You Have It Burned, Restart Your Computer & You Should See A Message Saying, Press And Key Too Boot From DVD.

If You Don't, Then Yeah, You Will Haft To Go Into Your Bios Boot Settings And Change Your Boot Sequence To Boot From The DVD, Instead Of Booting From Your Hard Drive By Default. :)

im on a mac using vmware fusion, im trying to install windows 7, ive downloaded like 4 different torrents on here and none of them have worked, with this one along with another one i downloaded i got to the install page (where it says "install now") after i click that a window pops up and says 

"A required CD/DVD drive device driver is missing. If you have a driver floppy disk, CD, DVD, or USB flash drive, please insert it now.

Note: If the Windows installation media is in the CD/DVD drive, you can safely remove it for this step."

why is it saying this? i cant get past this, how can i fix this?

read all the comments on every site i could google and tried whole night to counter this problem..
"A required CD/DVD drive device driver is missing. If you have a driver floppy disk, CD, DVD, or USB flash drive, please insert it now.

Note: If the Windows installation media is in the CD/DVD drive, you can safely remove it for this step."

tried to manually locate every small folder in the driver disc provided by my manufacturer as well as on the windows installation disc.[ I used Flashboot to install win-7 Home Premium from this torrent through usb pen drive - 8 GB ]
I even downloaded some chipset and usb drivers from the manufacturer website using another pc n tried to locate them on the notebook on which i was trying to install windows. But the problem was still there untill i copied all files from the Downloaded and mounted image to that pendrive n tried again. It finally Worked .... xD
Just for a test.. i tried it again with another(fast speed) usb, and yes it asked for drivers. When i installed drivers for usb 3.0 from the manufacturer's disc. The same usb disc worked again.
